languages.text: "Помрет"? Тебя устроит обычная быстрая смерть твоего заклятого врага, не украшенная часами рукотворных мучений?"
"'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"
languages.original_text: "Помрет"? Тебя устроит обычная быстрая смерть твоего заклятого врага, не украшенная часами рукотворных мучений?"

traits.locale_text: "'Die'? You would be satisfied with a mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"
"'Die'? You would be satisfied with a mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"
"'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"
"'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"
"'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"

languages.text: « Le tuer ? Allez-vous réellement vous contenter, pour votre pire ennemi, d'une mort rapide et ordinaire, sans lui infliger de longues heures d'une souffrance savamment orchestrée ? »
languages.original_text: "'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"

traits.locale_text: « Le tuer ? Allez-vous réellement vous contenter, pour votre pire ennemi, d'une mort rapide et ordinaire, sans lui infliger de longues heures d'une souffrance savamment orchestrée ? »

languages.text: 「死ねだと？最悪の敵に何時間も苦しみを与え続けるという喜びを感じないまま、楽に死なせるなど、本当にそれで満足するのか？」
languages.original_text: "'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"

traits.locale_text: 「死ねだと？最悪の敵に何時間も苦しみを与え続けるという喜びを感じないまま、楽に死なせるなど、本当にそれで満足するのか？」

languages.text: “‘死’就够了吗？你就打算这么给你的宿敌一个痛快，不打算用长达几个小时的痛苦来装点一下吗？”
languages.original_text: "'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"

traits.locale_text: “‘死’就够了吗？你就打算这么给你的宿敌一个痛快，不打算用长达几个小时的痛苦来装点一下吗？”

languages.text: "'Sterben'? Ihr wäret mit dem trivialen, schnellen Tod Eures schlimmsten Feindes zufrieden, ohne ihn durch stundenlange kunstvolle Qualen auszuschmücken?"
languages.original_text: "'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"

traits.locale_text: "'Sterben'? Ihr wäret mit dem trivialen, schnellen Tod Eures schlimmsten Feindes zufrieden, ohne ihn durch stundenlange kunstvolle Qualen auszuschmücken?"

languages.text: «¿"Morirá"? Te basta con la muerte rápida y banal de tu peor enemigo? ¿No piensas adornarla con unas pocas horas de angustia exquisita?».
languages.original_text: "'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"

traits.locale_text: «¿"Morirá"? Te basta con la muerte rápida y banal de tu peor enemigo? ¿No piensas adornarla con unas pocas horas de angustia exquisita?».

languages.text: "'Geberecek mi? En büyük düşmanına yavan, hızlı bir ölümü mü reva görüyorsun yani? Yok mu şöyle saatler sürecek, birbirinden ızdıraplı işkenceler?"
languages.original_text: "'Die'? You would be satisfied with the mundane, swift death of your worst enemy without even adorning it with hours of artfully crafted anguish?"

traits.locale_text: "'Geberecek mi? En büyük düşmanına yavan, hızlı bir ölümü mü reva görüyorsun yani? Yok mu şöyle saatler sürecek, birbirinden ızdıraplı işkenceler?"
